cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8026, a bill to designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 825 West 65th Street in Minneapolis, Minnesota, as the “Charles W. Lindberg Post Office

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 100 (Monday, June 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. OMAR:
H.R. 8026.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H5486]
title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 825 West 65th Street in Minneapolis, Minnesota, as the "Charles W. Lindberg Post Office".
